name: Overwatch
headline: Enterprise software for strategic, risk, and cyber fraud intelligence
description: Overwatch Data offers real-time, actionable intelligence tailored for your fraud, security, and strategic insights teams. Our platform provides a comprehensive and contextualized view of opportunities and risks, drawing on the surface, social, and deep web, thereby enabling faster, data-driven decision-making.

founders.name: Arjun Bisen, Founder
founders.description: I started my career as an Australian diplomat, during which time I analyzed geopolitical and economic risk across APAC and writing Australia's Cyber Engagement Strategy. I then studied the intersection of technology and risk at Harvard on a full Fulbright scholarship. I've since led risk teams at Stripe and Google Search before founding Overwatch to help those teams get ahead of emerging risks.

founders.name: Zara Perumal, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder / CTO at Overwatch Data

Zara studied Artificial Intelligence and Cybersecurity at MIT LIDS/CSAIL focusing on active learning for malware detection and risk-limiting post-election audits. After graduating, Zara worked on Google Assistant then at Google’s Threat Analysis Group,  where she built machine learning and software systems to use threat intelligence and malware analysis to better protect against targeted threats and disinformation by state sponsored actors.

# Real-time understanding, not noisy intelligence feeds
Overwatch Data brings you concise, actionable insights, tailored for your cyber, fraud, security, supply chain, and market intelligence needs. Experience a seamless intelligence solution that saves time and cuts through the noise, delivering the most important information directly to your team.
[![Build-Your-Own Custom Monitoring Icon](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/newsowl.svg)Build-Your-Own Custom Monitoring](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</build-your-own-custom-monitoring>)[![Cybersecurity, Fraud, and Financial Crime Intel Icon](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/fraud.svg)Cybersecurity, Fraud, and Financial Crime Intel](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</cybersecurity-fraud-and-financial-crime-intel>)[![Supply Chain, Critical Events, and Global Intel Icon](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/global.svg)Supply Chain, Critical Events, and Global Intel](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</supply-chain-critical-events-and-global-intel>)[![Brand, Reputation, and Exec Protection Icon](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/security.svg)Brand, Reputation, and Exec Protection](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</brand-reputation-and-exec-protection>)
[![Cyber Pulse Threat Intel Icon](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/cyber-pulse.svg)Cyber Pulse Threat Intel](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</cyber-pulse-threat-intel>)

## Our Solutions

![](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fnewsowls.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Fully customizable
Simple onboarding through which you can define the topics, narratives, events, and categories of interest
### Intuitive data visualizations
See your data come to life with effective visual representations, whether on maps, charts, word clouds or category breakdowns
### Executive summaries
Real-time executive summaries to help you keep your finger on the pulse
### Chat with your news data
Ask free-form questions of the news to get customized answers
[Request a demo](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</request-a-demo>)[Learn More →](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</build-your-own-custom-monitoring>)
Simple Onboarding
Note: If you are having any difficulties with the form, [watch a demo here](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/<https:/app.storylane.io/share/jq5s89qbehwk>) or please reach out to support@overwatchdata.io.
Step 1
Sign Up:
Following a demo, set up your profile through our simple onboarding process.
Step 2
Choose Services:
Pick from fraud, security, brand intel products or something custom. Select sources like News, Deep/Dark Web, and Social Platforms.
Step 3
Define & Customize:
Indicate your interests, categories, and desired actions. Tailor alerts to your needs.
Step 4
Monitor and Research:
Start tracking and chatting with your data on the Overwatch platform.
## From the blog
Learn how to grow your business with our expert advice.
![](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fblog%2Fblog28.png&w=3840&q=75)
Posted by **Zara Perumal** November 5, 2024- 1 min read
### [Telegram Tuesdays: The Collaborative Nature of Fraud](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</blog/telegram-tuesdays-the-collaborative-nature-of-fraud>)
Fraud today mirrors office teamwork, with roles and job-like postings, as seen in the Conti leaks. With 'fraud as a service' rising, assembling skilled teams for e-crime has never been easier—or eerier.
[Read full blog ](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</blog/telegram-tuesdays-the-collaborative-nature-of-fraud>)
![](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fblog%2Fblog27.png&w=3840&q=75)
Posted by **Zara Perumal** October 29, 2024- 2 min read
### [Telegram Tuesdays: Schoolhouse Rock! ... but Fraud](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</blog/telegram-tuesdays-schoolhouse-rock-but-fraud>)
Punchmade dev blends entertainment and fraud, using viral songs on TikTok and YouTube to teach scams, with a cashout method shop on Telegram.
[Read full blog ](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</blog/telegram-tuesdays-schoolhouse-rock-but-fraud>)
![](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fblog%2Fblog26.png&w=3840&q=75)
Posted by **Overwatch Data and Unit 221B** October 1, 2024- 6 min read
### [Telegram Tuesdays: Fraudsters responding to Telegram’s new policies](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</blog/telegram-tuesdays-fraudsters-responding-to-telegrams-new-policies>)
After Telegram's policy changes, fraudsters are eyeing alternatives like Signal. While chatter about migration has faded, illicit activities may shift to social media, complicating tracking efforts.
[Read full blog ](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</blog/telegram-tuesdays-fraudsters-responding-to-telegrams-new-policies>)
[View All](http://www.overwatchdata.ai/</blog>)

generated_description:
### Overwatch: AI-Powered Intelligence for Fraud and Security

**Founded:** 2022  
**Location:** New York, NY  
**Team Size:** 5 Employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S22

---

**Mission Statement:**  
At Overwatch, we specialize in enterprise software that delivers strategic, risk, and cyber fraud intelligence required by today's businesses.

---

**What We Do:**  
Overwatch began its journey as Overwatch Data, geared towards providing real-time, actionable intelligence designed for fraud, security, and strategic insights teams. Our innovative platform synthesizes data from the surface web, social media, and deep web, presenting a comprehensive and contextual view of both opportunities and risks. This approach empowers organizations to make faster, data-driven decisions without the noise typically associated with traditional intelligence feeds.

**Our Offerings:**
1. **Build-Your-Own Custom Monitoring:** Tailor monitoring solutions based on specific interests and needs.
2. **Cybersecurity, Fraud, and Financial Crime Intelligence:** Provide real-time insights into threats targeting organizations.
3. **Supply Chain, Critical Events, and Global Intel:** Keep a finger on the pulse of supply chain vulnerabilities and global events.
4. **Brand, Reputation, and Executive Protection:** Safeguard corporate reputations and manage executive risks.
5. **Cyber Pulse Threat Intelligence:** Access a curated intel feed on current threats, breaches, and vulnerabilities.

**Key Features:**
- **Simple Onboarding:** A user-friendly setup that allows you to customize topics, narratives, and alerts.
- **Intuitive Data Visualizations:** Transform data into easily digestible charts, maps, and summaries.
- **Real-Time Executive Summaries:** Get quick updates on key developments, keeping you informed without overwhelming you.
- **Interactive Chat with Data:** Engage with your news data through free-form questioning to get tailored insights.

---

**Recent Developments:**
As we delve deeper into the world of fraud and cybersecurity, our blog highlights ongoing trends, including the evolving nature of fraud communication channels, particularly on platforms like Telegram. Our content aims to keep businesses informed while also educating them on emerging threats.

**Website:** [Overwatch Data](http://www.overwatchdata.ai)

**Group Partner:** Michael Seibel from Y Combinator adds significant mentorship to our journey.

**Tags:** #saas #supply-chain #cybersecurity #ai #new-york

---

In a landscape where the stakes are high, Overwatch stands out by offering intelligence solutions that cut through the clutter. Our focus is not just about gathering data; it's about transforming that data into actionable insights that help businesses mitigate risk and seize opportunities in real-time.
